page.title: 04EDUCATION IN GROVE.
page.content: THERE ARE 2 PLAYGROUPS FOR CHILDREN AGED 3 TO 5. ACTIVITIES INCLUDE LEGO, PLASTICINE,SONGS,ART AND CRAFT, OUTSIDE TOYS. THERE ARE 2 PRIMARY SCHOOLS: GROVE C.E AND MILLBROOK INFANT AND JUNIOR. INFANT CHILDREN AGED 5 TO 7 LEARN READING,WRITING,MATHEMATICS,SPORT MUSIC,ART AND CRAFT. JUNIOR CHILDREN AGED 7 TO 11 STUDY LANGUAGE,MATHEMATICS INTERESTING PROJECTS(LIKE THIS),MUSIC, SPORT,GYMNASTICS,ART AND CRAFT. THERE ARE MANY ACTIVITIES AND EQUIPMENT(2 MICRO COMPUTERS). AT 11 CHILDREN GO TO SECONDARY SCHOOL IN WANTAGE. THE ADULT EDUCATION CENTRE IS RUN BY MRS NOBLE AND HELPERS. THERE ARE CLASSES IN TYPING,LANGUAGES,MUSIC,EXERCISE ETC. ALL AGES MAY TAKE PART. By Stephen.M,Duane.C.Duncan.V.
